branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled - Slide Bearing
branchCategory.description: <p>Rodless cylinder, magnetically coupled series CY*S type includes an integrated slide bearing for stroke accuracy and repeatability.  Magnetically coupled cylinders have a wide range of applications, and save mounting space.  Loads and moments are possible through the use of integrated guides.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled - Slide Bearing

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, CY1S-Z, Magnetically Coupled (mm Stroke) - Slide Bearing
branchItem.description: <p>The CY1S-Z Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled uses industrial strength magnets located in the piston and external carriage to form a single unit that will travel when actuated with air pressure.  It is a one piece unit integrated with slide bearings which provides lateral stability protecting it from side load impacts.  The CY1S-Z cylinder tube has lube retainers on the internal and external surfaces to retain lubrication.</p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, NC(D)Y2S, Magnetically Coupled, (Inch Stroke) - Slide Bearing
branchItem.description: <p>The NCY2S Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled uses industrial strength magnets located in the piston and external carriage to form a single unit that will travel when actuated with air pressure.  It is available in a standard or heavy duty magnetic holding force.  It is a one piece unit integrated with slide bearings which provides lateral stability protecting it from side load impacts.</p>
